title: Hers
product_desc: A premium nutritional supplement meticulously designed for women, featuring pioneering Hydrastat Nano Technology for optimal absorption.
free_shipping_desc: Free U.S. shipping for orders over $200+

items.caption: Key ingredients to balance and support your hormone health, daily.
For every season in life–active menstruation, pre/active/post menopause
Increase significant relief of hot flashes or cramps within just 20 minutes of consumption

tab.title: See how Hers is changing lives

review_list.review_text: Hers has been a game-changer for me! I've been using it for a few months now, and I've noticed a significant improvement in my energy levels and overall vitality. It's amazing how something so simple can have such profound effects. Highly recommend!

I've struggled with maintaining hormone balance for years, but Hers has made a world of difference. Not only do I feel more balanced and energized, but I've also noticed improvements in my skin tone and muscle tone. It's truly remarkable!

product_benefits.title: Benefits of using Hers
product_benefits.desc: Every woman knows about the inconveniences that cycles and hormone changes can bring into life.Experience rapid results through our HydraStat™ Nanotechnology. Our nano-sized ingredients, wrapped in water clusters, are small enough to be absorbed fully by the human cell, which is right where you need them!

items.title: Ingredients You Can Trust
items.desc: Hers uses our HydraStat™ nano-delivery system to maximize absorption and effectiveness of the following ingredients: white peony extract, chaste berry, dong quai, maca root, ashwagandha and other nutrients.

items.title: Results You Can Count On
items.desc: We conducted a double-blind clinical trial, and 80% of participants, spanning from active menstruation to post-menopause, saw a marked improvement in their symptoms. Notably some experiencing hot flashes or cramps reported significant relief within just 20 minutes of consumption.

items.title: For Every Season Of Life
items.desc: Hers is designed for all women, in every season of life. Every ingredient in our botanical formula was carefully selected to create a well-rounded blend of benefits. With Hers, every woman can flourish.

product_post_list.title: Innovative science
product_post_list.desc: Glutathione is the protector and detoxifier of the cell.It’s the key to the life, health, performance, protection and longevity of every human cell.

product_post_list.title: HydraStat™ nanotechnology
product_post_list.desc: Nano-sized particles protected by ultra-pure water clusters.Our nanosized ingredients are small enough to be fully absorbed into the human cell.

product_post_list.title: Quality over quantity
product_post_list.desc: A supplement is only as good as its bioavailability, which is its ability to be absorbed and used by the body.The correct delivery system delivers ingredients to your body in a way that your body can absorb and use.

steps.caption: Measure two (2) teaspoons of product. One capful = teaspoon.
Swish in your mouth for 30 seconds or more.
Unlike mouthwash, you can swallow Hers. You can also spit it out, if you prefer.
Repeat these steps twice a day. Feel free to use Hers  more often, if desired.

key_ingredients.title: Hers key ingredients
key_ingredients.ingredients: Active Ingredients: ULTRA-PURE WATER, B6, B12, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, SPEARMINT EXTRACT.

items.desc: Glutathione is able to neutralize free radicals and protect the body from their harmful effects.It also helps to reduce inflammation, and supports the body's natural ability to fight off infection.In addition, it plays a role in the synthesis of new immune cells, keeping your immune system functioning at its best.
